name: Brittonsbirthday
body:
# Happy Birthday, Britton!
## You solved the code!

Now I will tell you about your present.
For your birthday you get to go on a shopping spree!
Here are the details:
* You get to spend $12 dollars for every year youâ€™ve been alive. 
+ 6 years * $12 per year =  ____ (what is 6 times 12?)
* We can go to any store or stores you want. 

To schedule your shopping spree have your parents talk to me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
